SEARCH
Package Core.Lightning

Class PointLight

java.lang.Object
Core.Lightning.PointLight
public class PointLight extends Object
The PointLight class represents a point light source in a 3D scene.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PointLight(org.joml.Vector3f color, org.joml.Vector3f position, float intensity)
    Constructs a new PointLight with the specified color, position, and intensity.
    PointLight(org.joml.Vector3f color, org.joml.Vector3f position, float intensity, float constant, float linear, float exponent)
    Constructs a new PointLight with the specified color, position, intensity, constant, linear, and exponent.

  • Constructor Details

    • PointLight

      public PointLight(org.joml.Vector3f color, org.joml.Vector3f position, float intensity, float constant, float linear, float exponent)
      Constructs a new PointLight with the specified color, position, intensity, constant, linear, and exponent.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the light represented by a Vector3f.
      position - The position of the light represented by a Vector3f.
      intensity - The intensity of the light.
      constant - The constant attenuation factor.
      linear - The linear attenuation factor.
      exponent - The exponent attenuation factor.

    • PointLight

      public PointLight(org.joml.Vector3f color, org.joml.Vector3f position, float intensity)
      Constructs a new PointLight with the specified color, position, and intensity. Uses default values for constant, linear, and exponent attenuation factors.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the light represented by a Vector3f.
      position - The position of the light represented by a Vector3f.
      intensity - The intensity of the light.
